explains: adj. [无化] 无机的；无生物的
wordGroup: inorganic material 无机材料，无机物质
inorganic compound n. 无机化合物
inorganic chemicals 无机化学；无机化学材料
inorganic matter 无机物质，无机物
inorganic coating 无机涂料；无机涂层

sentences.en: Generally speaking, ceramics are what you get when you apply heat to certain inorganic, non-metallic solids and then allow them to cool.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，陶瓷就是你加热某些无机的、非金属的固体然后让它们冷却得到的东西。

sentences.en: Chemoautotrophs and chemoheterotrophs obtain energy from inorganic oxidation reactions.
sentences.cn: 化学自养生物和化学异养生物从无机氧化反应获得能量。

sentences.en: In fact, it's inorganic chemistry and it has upset the aquatics world.
sentences.cn: 实际上，这种新型泳衣就是无机化学的产物，它已经颠覆了整个水上运动界。
